name: Infested Inside Multiplayer Online
detailed_description:
Infested Inside Multiplayer Online takes back the principle of John Carpenter's film "The Thing", where one of the member of the crew is infested by The Thing. The guy infested has to kill everyone else. The other guys have to find who is The Thing and kill him. They can also escape map at the end of the timer if they have found keys to open one or more doors !

  • 2 Maps[
  • More Than 10 Different Weapons
  • The Thing has his own special abilities : he can smell others, buries himself awazy, spread a slowing gel on others,

It may have minor corrections in gameplay so any feedback is welcome !

short_description: This game is a "the thing" like where one of the guys is infected and has to kill others. The others have to find who is infected and to kill him together.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP and above
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
